sub_title: AI will not replace you. A person using AI will. So, who are you?
summary:
I am Executive Creative Director for iO and as independent creative director I was invited by OpenAI Spring 2022, to join their pre-selected handful of creative professionals worldwide, to help them research, train, test, improve and promote their GenAI iterations.

I advise advertising and design companies on the topic of AI and its impact on our industry. I help them implement AI to gain extra creative leverage.

Currently I am testing OpenAI's Dall•E Experimental, which is still in alpha phase, as well as the multimodal version of ChatGPT, which will generate images too. Additionally, I’m affiliated with D-ID whom I've helped conceiving their Creative Reality Studio. With Arno Coenen I founded award winning AI-art collective CØ11@BorAi+oR⚡

For design- and ad-agencies I conceived creative campaign concepts, big and long strategically and technologically powered ideas. I spark creative processes with and within creative teams and I explore how disruptive tech - like Artificial Intelligence - augments creative professionals in their creativity, reach and effectiveness.

I conceived many on/ off/ through and beyond the line ad campaigns, which I helped materialise in any way. Whatever the medium, for whenever moment in whatever funnel (I prefer Google’s model though).

On the way to DALL•E 2's beta launch, I -as part of a small group of people- tested that AI for unwanted biases through creative experimentation, conceived new relevant product concepts inspired by the AI’s capabilities and helped OpenAI find high profile Dutch creative professionals as well as renowned Dutch artists to be DALL•E 2’s first artistic ambassadors.

After DALL•E 2 was made accessible to the public, also our research phase crew of creatives were allowed monetising our historically significant creative explorations. DALL•E's launch served as blueprint launching ChatGPT, sept. '22.

Today I am testing new DALL•E version V2.Experimental, ChatGPT Multimodal and its revolutionary Plugin Store. I also help other AI developing companies such as D-ID, advice on EU vs US privacy and IP-complexity and on how to responsibly and safely integrate AI effectively into workflows.

Companies & brands making good use of my creative services over the last 25+ years:

Alfred, Amsterdam Worldwide, BBDO, BIG, BSUR, ChatGPT, Cloudfactory, DALL•E 2, DAWN, DDB, D-ID, Fitzroy, H+K WPP, Havas, iO, Isobar, Lemon Scented Tea, Lowe, McCann, McGarryBowen (Dentsu), Ogilvy, OpenAI, RLVNT, Social Embassy, Springbok, Strawberry Frog, Studio Dumbar/DEPT, TAXI WPP, Total Design, Ubachs Wisbrun (JWT) and VBAT WPP.

[{'company': {'id': 11130470, 'name': 'OpenAI', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQG0lRhNgYJCXw/company-logo_400_400/0/1678382029586?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=-LGIyhUr3PxJlM_-47bCKGuknEnayVQs_CVEvjS3ePM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/openai/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'OpenAI', 'description': 'OpenAI’s goal: ‘To develop beneficial A(G)I responsibly.’ Doing so through developing, training, researching and testing AI iterations.

Secondary goals:
Preventing harmful generations, curbing misuse, phased deployment based on learning from real-world use.

I contributed making their generative AI safe for beta and public launch.

Spring 2022, OpenAI Inc. established a small pre-selected group of creative professionals worldwide, when they were developing, researching, training and testing groundbreaking generative AI under supervised conditions. Main goal: Aligning their AI iterations with their purposes. In the process I conceived concepts on how their AI could be relevant ranging from education to creative industries.

As we together learned about the AI’s capabilities and limitations, gaining important confidence in the safety systems, OpenAI felt comfortable asking me to bring on board new users, more diversity, contributing to the successful beta launch of DALL•E 2, July\xa02022.

During this research period - as part of the DALL•E 2 pre-launch crea crew - I helped OpenAI:

1: Expose unwanted biases in their AI. 
2: Improve usability of DALL•E’s UX.
3: Conceive a monetising model.
4: Conceive novel concepts in education e.g.
5: Promote its creative potential in social media.
6: Inspire creative professionals how to implement AI in their workflow.

Also I helped OpenAI to get in contact with Dutch creative talent and with renowned Dutch artists, to become OpenAI’s creative ambassadors in The Netherlands.

With launching DALL•E’s API, OpenAI as a token of their appreciation, handed over all rights of our very first experimental DALL•E 2 art to us creators, allowing monetising our very first historically significant creative AI explorations.

Today I also help other AI initiatives explore how OpenAI’s work can benefit their projects, resulting in innovative applications.

FYI: I share my AI creations on Instagram:
